paramagpy.protein.CustomStructureBuilder.init_residue¶

CustomStructureBuilder.init_residue(resname, field, resseq, icode)¶

Create a new Residue object.

Parameters

  • "ASN" (- resname - string, e.g.) –

  • for (- field - hetero flag, "W" for waters, "H") – hetero residues, otherwise blank.

  • identifier (- resseq - int, sequence) –

  • code (- icode - string, insertion) –
